item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

item.title: Vegetarian Honey Barbecue Sauce
item.description: Prepare this vegetarian honey barbecue sauce recipe when you’re grilling outside or cooking inside. It makes your vegetarian burgers, and ribs taste amazing. Vegetarian Honey Barbecue Sauce Ingredients 1 c ketchup 1/2 c honey 1 tbsp yellow mustard 1 tbsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1/2 onion small diced 1 tbsp garlic, fresh chopped 1/4 c brown sugar 1/8 c vinegar 1 tbsp soy sauce 2 tbsp Italian herb seasoning 1 tsp ground rosemary 1/2 c red wine 1/8 c molasses Combine ingredients in sauce pan, simmer for 1/2 hour, stirring frequently.
